All,

We're in the process of releasing 4.8.2 (a small interim bugfix
release).  I'd like to do the right steps with respect to maven, but
have to admit that I'm not at all sure what steps will make it
available to everyone's repo.  Can someone walk me through it?  I
believe that the existing feature request references both a Sonatype
and Codehaus repo:

http://github.com/KentBeck/junit/issues/issue/66/#comment_181769

Thanks,

   David Saff
